        public Application getApplication(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        Description copied from interface: ApplicationResolver
        Returns the Stormpath Application record that reflects the currently running web application.
        Specified by:
        getApplication in interface ApplicationResolver
        Parameters:
